definition: ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: EA brings MONOPOLY's new card game to mobile.
sentences.chinese: 電子藝界壟斷帶來的新遊戲移動。

sentences.english: Non-public capital is allowed to enter the monopolized industries and fields.
sentences.chinese: 允許非公有資本進入壟斷行業和領域。

sentences.english: The Anti-monopoly Authority shall maintain the confidentiality of the person making such report.
sentences.chinese: 反壟斷執法機構應當爲舉報人保密。

sentences.english: These monopolizations never fail in invalidating the "free market".
sentences.chinese: 這些壟斷總使“自由市場”無奈地失效。

sentences.english: The only method to change buyer's habit is inquiring the monopolization position.
sentences.chinese: 而要改變用戶的習慣的唯一方法就是獲得壟斷的地位。

sentences.english: The company monopolized the supply of grain.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司壟斷了糧食的供應。

sentences.english: Party leaders have ensured that the ACFTU has a monopolist position.
sentences.chinese: 檔的領導人保證全總工擁有壟斷地位。

sentences.english: Companies to switch to the formation of investment is a way of monopoly.
sentences.chinese: 公司轉投資是壟斷形成的一種途徑。

sentences.english: The most common source is to be granted a monopoly by the government, either through patents, in which case the monopoly is temporary, or through a government franchise.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的是由政府授予的壟斷，比如說專利或特許權。

sentences.english: In 1998 the Department of Justice launched an anti-trust case against Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 1998年司法部門以反壟斷之名起訴微軟。

sentences.english: Why wasn’t the Web colonized by monopolists a decade ago?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼萬維網沒有在十年前就被壟斷？

sentences.english: Based on this theory, many countries carried out anti-monopoly reform and legal regulation on the electricity industry.
sentences.chinese: 這正是各國電力行業改革與反壟斷法律規制的依據。

sentences.english: Therefore, when information becomes like water, can anyone monopolise it?
sentences.chinese: 所以，資訊如水，誰能壟斷？

sentences.english: More and more countries realize the importance of international anti - monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的國家認識到國際反壟斷的重要性。

sentences.english: V. How can Anti-monopoly Law Regulate the Court of Law for Abuse of Power?
sentences.chinese: 反壟斷法如何規制法院權力濫用？

sentences.english: Sup Sam Hung in Guangzhou is a licensed foreign trade organization with special authority from the Qing government.
sentences.chinese: 清代廣州十三行是政府特許的外貿壟斷組織。

definition: to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
